page.title: 13Playing Marbles, and Skip.
page.content:
"Do you want a game of marbles?" "No shooting first shot" "Go on then it is your shot" "Oh bother I missed"
"Its not your gobby yet" "Lets see whos got the biggest marbles" "I've got a gobby, that's fifth biggest" "And I've got a queenie, that's fourth, Kingie next" "I've got one of those" "Don't interrupt, mine's bigger than an emperor, it's a jumbo" I'll go first you go second and you go last. Jump, flick, your out. Oh!. That wasn't a mistake. I shall jump on the elastic. You go in that end, and I'll go in the other end. Jump on the elastic, jump off the elastic, jump on, jump off, jump on, jump over. "Oh good I have finished that height. Higher it to the shinsies now "Ok". "Jump over. Oh dear! You have made a mistake. Try again!
